Verses: 1 isravel Thanakku Undaana Yaavaiyum Serththukkondu Purappattup Beyersebaavukkup Poi, Than Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkudaiya Dhevanukkup Baliyittaan.
2 andru Iravile Dhevan Isravelukkuth Dharisanamaagi: Yaakkobe, Yaakkobe Endru Kooppittaar; Avan Idho, Adiyen Endraan.
3 appozhudhu Avar: Naan Dhevan, Naan Un Thagappanudaiya Dhevan; Nee Egipthudhesaththukkuppogap Bayappadavendaam; Ange Unnaip Periya Jaadhiyaakkuven.
4 naan Unnudane Egipthukku Varuven; Naan Unnaith Thirumbavum Varappannuven; Yoseppu Than Kaiyaal Un Kangalai Mooduvaan Endru Sonnaar.

5 adharkuppinbu, Yaakkobu Beyersebaavilirundhu Pirayaanam Purappattaan. Isravelin Kumaarar Thangal Thagappanaagiya Yaakkobaiyum Thangal Kuzhandhaigalaiyum Thangal Manaivigalaiyum Paarvon Anuppina Vandigalinmel Etrikkondu,
6 thangal Aadumaadugalaiyum Thaangal Kaanaan Dhesaththil Sambaadhiththa Thangal Porutkalaiyum Serththukkondu, Yaakkobum Avan Sandhadhiyaar Yaavarum Egipthukkup Ponaargal.
7 avan Than Kumaararaiyum Than Kumaararin Kumaararaiyum Than Kumaaraththigalaiyum Than Kumaararin Kumaaraththigalaiyum Than Sandhadhiyaar Anaivaraiyum Egipthukkuth Thannode Azhaiththukkonduponaan.
8 egipthukku Vandha Isravelarin Naamangalaavana: Yaakkobum Avanudaiya Kumaararum; Yaakkobudaiya Mooththakumaaranaana Rooban.
9 roobanudaiya Kumaarar Aanokku, Palloo, Esron, Karmee Enbavargal.
10 simiyonudaiya Kumaarar Emuvel, Yaamin, Okaadh, Yaakeen, Sokaar, Kaanaaniya Sthireeyin Kumaaranaagiya Savul Enbavargal.
11 leviyinudaiya Kumaarar Kerson, Kokaadh, Meraari Enbavargal.
12 yoodhaavinudaiya Kumaarar Er, Onaan, Selaa, Paares, Seraa Enbavargal; Avargalil Erum Onaanum Kaanaandhesaththil Irandhuponaargal; Paaresudaiya Kumaarar Esron, Aamool Enbavargal.
13 isakkaarudaiya Kumaarar Tholaa, Poovaa, Yopu, Simron Enbavargal.
14 sepulonudaiya Kumaarar Seredh, Elon, Yaklel Enbavargal.

15 ivargal Leyaalin Sandhadhiyaar; Aval Ivargalaiyum Theenaal Ennum Oru Kumaaraththiyaiyum Padhaan Araamile Yaakkobukkup Petraal; Avan Kumaararum Avan Kumaaraththigalumaagiya Ellaarum Muppaththumoondruper.
16 kaaththudaiya Kumaarar, Sippiyon, Aki, Sooni, Espon, Eri, Arodhi, Areli Enbavargal.
17 aaserudaiya Kumaarar Imnaa, Isvaa, Isvi, Pereeyaa Enbavargal; Ivargaludaiya Sagodhari Seraakku Enbaval; Pereeyaavin Kumaarar Eper, Malkiyel Enbavargal.
18 ivargal Laabaan Than Kumaaraththiyaagiya Leyaalukkuk Koduththa Silpaaludaiya Pillaigal; Aval Indhap Padhinaaruperaiyum Yaakkobukkup Petraal.
19 yaakkobin Manaiviyaagiya Raakeludaiya Kumaarar Yoseppu, Benyameen Enbavargal.
20 yoseppukku Egipthudhesaththile Manaaseyum Eppiraayeemum Pirandhaargal; Avargalai Onpattanaththu Aasaariyanaagiya Poththipiraavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Aasnaath Avanukkup Petraal.
21 benyameenudaiya Kumaarar Pelaa, Peker, Aspel, Keraa, Naagamaan, Eki, Rosh, Muppim, Uppim, Aardhu Enbavargal.
22 raakel Yaakkobukkup Petra Kumaararaagiya Ivargal Ellaarum Padhinaaluper.
23 thaanudaiya Kumaaran Useem Enbavan.
24 napthaliyin Kumaarar Yaadhsiyel, Kooni, Edhser, Sillem Enbavargal.
25 ivargal Laabaan Than Kumaaraththiyaagiya Raakelukkuk Koduththa Pilgaal Yaakkobukkup Petravargal; Ivargal Ellaarum Ezhuper.
26 yaakkobudaiya Kumaararin Manaivigalaith Thavira, Avanudaiya Karppappirappaayirundhu Avan Moolamaai Egipthile Vandhavargal Ellaarum Aruvaththaaruper.
27 yoseppukku Egipthile Pirandha Kumaarar Iranduper; Aaga Egipthukkup Pona Yaakkobin Kudumbaththaar Ezhuvadhuper.
28 kosen Naattile Thannai Yoseppu Sandhikka Varumbadi Solla, Yoodhaavaith Thanakku Munnaaga Avanidaththil Yaakkobu Anuppinaan; Avargal Kosenile Serndhaargal.

29 yoseppu Than Iradhaththai Aayaththappaduththi, Adhinmel Eri, Than Thagappanaagiya Isravelaich Sandhikkumbadi Poi, Avanaik Kandu, Avanudaiya Kazhuthdhaik Kattikkondu, Veguneram Avan Kazhuththai Vidaamal Azhudhaan.
30 appozhudhu Isravel Yoseppaip Paarththu: Nee Innum Uyirodirukkiraaye, Naan Un Mugaththaik Kanden, Enakku Ippodhu Maranam Vandhaalum Varattum Endraan.

31 pinbu, Yoseppu Than Sagodhararaiyum Than Thagappanudaiya Kudumbaththaaraiyum Nokki: Naan Paarvonidaththukkup Poi, Kaanaandhesaththilirundhu En Sagodhararum En Thagappan Kudumbaththaarum Ennidaththil Vandhirukkiraargal.
32 avargal Meyppargal, Aadumaadugalai Meykkiradhu Avargal Thozhil; Avargal Thangal Aadumaadugalaiyum Thangalukku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Konduvandhaargal Endru Avarukkuch Sollugiren.
33 paarvon Ungalai Azhaiththu, Ungal Thozhil Enna Endru Kettaal,

34 neengal, Kosen Naattile Kudiyirukkumbadi, Avanai Nokki: Engal Pidhaakkalaippola, Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangalum Engal Siruvayadhumudhal Idhuvaraikkum Meyppargalaayirukkirom Endru Sollungal; Meyppargal Ellaarum Egipthiyarukku Aruvaruppaayirukkiraargal Endraan.
